greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Rearrangement of squares such that sum of two consecutive terms is a prime.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: mx = 100; free = Range[2, mx]^2; t = {1}; While[i = 1; While[i <= Length[free] && ! PrimeQ[t[[-1]] + free[[i]]], i++]; i <= Length[free], AppendTo[t, free[[i]]]; free = Delete[free, i]]; t (* _T. D. Noe_, Dec 18 2012 *)
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Aug 10 2002
